name: Pyrinika
description:
Nuke your friends! Nuke your enemies! Nuke those towards which you feel ambiguously!

Survive in the rapidly escalating nuclear war that has gripped the entire globe. Choose wisely between a defensive or offensive playstyle. Launch your nuclear missiles at timid or fierce opponents, break down weak defenses.

Be the last one standing!

Controls:

WASD or mouse  - Pan the camera

Scroll wheel - Zoom the Camera

Space Bar - Pause/ unpause time

ESCAPE - Main menu

Leftclick - Select region

Rightclick - Deselect region

This game was made solo by Jack Clark, design, programming, and art assets were developed by Jack Clark. Sound assets and fonts were used from online copyright free repositories. Playtested by my lovely partner and flatmates.

Install Instructions:

1. Download and unzip file

2. Open "Pyrinika.exe"

3. The game should run
